Business Details
Edit info for this business Hours: Not available Categories: Chicken Restaurants, Fast Food Restaurants Payment: AMEX, MASTER CARD, VISA General Info
Started in 1946 with a simple idea of making chicken sandwiches, Chick-Fil-A has grown into one of the largest, privately owned restaurant chains in the United States. It has expertise in preparing chicken recipes and uses peanut oil in its cooking processes. The chain s restaurants serve chicken wraps, sandwiches, burritos and nuggets, as well as a variety of salads, hand-spun milkshakes and waffle fries. Recognized as the pioneer in quick-service mall food, Chick-Fil-A operates more than 1,400 restaurants in over 35 U.S. states. With annual sales of nearly $2 billion, the chain employs approximately 50,000 associates. Chick-Fil-A participates in various community-based projects, such as health awareness and scholarship programs. Its Kid's Meal program is designed to help parents with physical and character development of their children. Additionally, the chain s restaurants conduct the Chick-Fil-A Leadership Scholarship Program, which focuses on creating higher education opportunities for employees.

See all recommendations»
5 stars
Lisspratt 07/20/2011
The best Chick-Fil-A Restaurant in the…
The best Chick-Fil-A Restaurant in the nation! I've heard stories of people who come from everywhere just to eat there! Once you walk into the restaurant, they open the door for you and greet you with a warm smile. When your ready to order, you only have to wait for an average time of 30 seconds after you've ordered, and they ALWAYS get your order right! if they're not that fast, they'll have you take a seat and even bring out the food to your table with everything you need! While your eating their yummy Chicken Nuggets with Polynesian Sauce, a"Guest Specialist"comes by, (kind of like your personal waiter/waitress) offers you Mints to eat after your meal, refill your drinks (for free!) and take away your tray when your done. Wow! Is all I can say. That is the best Quick Served Fast Food Restaurant I have EVER experienced. And what makes it an even better bonus is: They have FREE WIFI!!!!!!
Was this helpful? Yes No Respond Flag abuse
4 stars
Leslie M. 03/17/2006
Chick-Fil-A
Provided by Judy's Book
If you haven't eaten here, you are missing out. They don't make those cheap tasting dollar sandwhiches. They make tasty crunchy, real chicken ones.I love their lemonade. I don't know if it is fresh squeezed or not, but it tastes pretty good. I could drink gallons of it and not grow tired of the yummy taste.Go their and try it out. You won't be disapoointed.
Was this helpful? Yes No Respond Flag abuse
4 stars
ucla 04/28/2005
Best Fast-Food in USA
Provided by Citysearch
Chic-fil-a is the best, and the old (drive-through only) IN-AND-OUT Burgers, a close second for fast-food. Of all the mall-located Chic-fil-a's in Utah, this one is the best. That's because it is the only stand-alone, and the newest. The new menu items are tried here first. Try the sandwich, strips, and nuggets in-that-order. But stay from the WORST and only item that should be removed from the menu: the cool wraps (ABSOLUTE PURE GARBAGE)!
